Armenia.name: Public Services Regulatory Commission (PSRC)
Armenia.notes: Established on April 3, 1997 by decree of the President of the Republic of Armenia

Argentina.name: National Electricity Regulator (ENRE)
Argentina.notes: Independent entity within the Energy Secretariat responsible for applying regulatory framework

Australia.name: Australian Energy Market Commission (AEMC)
Australia.notes: AEMC was established in 2005. National Electricity Market was established in 1998

Germany.name: Federal Network Agency (BNetzA)
Germany.notes: Regulates electricity, gas, telecommunications, post and railway markets

Spain.name: National Commission on Markets and Competition (CNMC)
Spain.notes: Originally established as CNE in 1998, merged to form CNMC in 2013

Poland.name: Energy Regulatory Office (URE)
Poland.notes: Established in 1997 to regulate energy sector

Georgia.name: Georgian National Energy and Water Supply Regulatory Commission (GNERC)

Chile.name: National Energy Commission (CNE)
Chile.notes: Established in 1978, one of the oldest energy regulators
